adrFormatAddress: 1674 Broadway #7b, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
I have happily known Andrea for over 10 years. She has always been an absolute professional that I gladly refer to numerous clients.

I have been inspired and mentored by numerous industry leaders and she has been a wealth of knowledge and experience.

Thank you so much for all that you have done for me on my professional and my private journeys.

originalText.text: I have known Andrea, President & CEO of ACE Media Corp., for over 40 years on a personal level. I have, also, worked with her on a business level for many years and can honestly state that she exemplifies true compassion and leadership as well as professionalism on both levels. I plan to work with her again in the near future and I am looking forward to it. Keep up the GREAT work!

text.text: I have known Andrea, President & CEO of ACE Media Corp., for over 40 years on a personal level. I have, also, worked with her on a business level for many years and can honestly state that she exemplifies true compassion and leadership as well as professionalism on both levels. I plan to work with her again in the near future and I am looking forward to it. Keep up the GREAT work!

originalText.text: Andrea Holmes Thompkins, CEO of Ace Media Corp, stands out as both an exceptional mentor and media professional. Her ethical and strategic approach to her work is truly commendable. Her dedication and remarkable achievements make her a genuine source of inspiration in the fields of media and marketing.

text.text: Andrea Holmes Thompkins, CEO of Ace Media Corp, stands out as both an exceptional mentor and media professional. Her ethical and strategic approach to her work is truly commendable. Her dedication and remarkable achievements make her a genuine source of inspiration in the fields of media and marketing.

originalText.text:
I hired Ace Media Corp and its owner Andrea Holmes Thompkins to secure a sponsor for my breast cancer fundraising event in October 2022, based on her enthusiasm for the cause. I paid a $5,500 fee, plus 20% of any sponsorship she acquired. As we entered Q1 2023, Andrea had yet to deliver a sponsor despite repeated promises. Meanwhile, I was funding advertising and event promotion from my own pocket. As Q2 began, I increased my urgency, but was met with more excuses and unfulfilled commitments. Despite Andrea suggesting high-profile interested parties like NBC, GM, and Toyota, these leads never materialized.

When I initiated contact with a potential guest speaker, Andrea insisted she would handle it. She mentioned a commitment from a CBD company, which I couldn't accept due to federal laws. As my event's deadline approached in June 2023, I had only sold 15 of the 80 tickets. I requested a refund from Andrea, who responded by offering 50% of my initial fee. When I requested documentation of her efforts, the provided proof was unsatisfactory. Contact with one of the companies she claimed to have approached revealed they had no knowledge of my event.

By the agreed refund deadline of June 30th, 2023, I had received nothing. A month later, I'm still waiting. The fallout from my dealings with Ace Media Corp has been significant: it cost me financially, tarnished my reputation, and adversely affected the charities I was supporting.

Although Andrea promised a minimum of $50K in sponsorship, the outcome was nothing close. The lessons I've learned from this experience are to thoroughly vet anyone you hire and to be skeptical of offers that seem too good to be true. Despite the negative experience, I maintain the truth of my account regardless of any potential backlash. Please consider this review before engaging with Ace Media Corp or Andrea Holmes Thompkins.

originalText.text: ACE Media has provided the most professional Media, Advertising and Marketing services to my companies for over 15 years.
